/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their beige and brown facades standing out against the blue sky. The buildings are adorned with numerous windows and balconies, hinting at the bustling life within. A few trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of green to the urban setting. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image.
